xwikidoc.name: SectionContentTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: # Class fields UnifiedDocument.Code.SectionContent.SectionContentClass_title=Title UnifiedDocument.Code.SectionContent.SectionContentClass_content=Content UnifiedDocument.Code.SectionContent.SectionContentClass_section=Section name # Sheet keys sectioncontent.sheet.description=This page controls how Section pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. sectioncontent.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected Section Contents object. sectioncontent.sheet.noFields=The Section application doesn't have any fields to display. ## Information tab keys sectioncontent.info.section=Section name sectioncontent.info.noSection=No section name sectioncontent.info.unifiedDocuments=Unified Documents sectioncontent.info.noUnifiedDocument=No unified documents # Live table generic keys sectioncontent.livetable.doc.title=Page Title sectioncontent.livetable.doc.name=Page Name sectioncontent.livetable.doc.space=Space sectioncontent.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name sectioncontent.livetable.doc.location=Location sectioncontent.livetable.doc.author=Last Author sectioncontent.livetable.doc.creator=Creator sectioncontent.livetable.doc.date=Date sectioncontent.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation Date sectioncontent.livetable._avatar=Avatar sectioncontent.livetable._images=Images sectioncontent.livetable._attachments=Attachments sectioncontent.livetable._actions=Actions sectioncontent.livetable._actions.edit=Edit sectioncontent.livetable._actions.delete=Delete sectioncontent.livetable.emptyvalue=- # Live table specific keys sectioncontent.livetable.title=Title sectioncontent.livetable.content=Content sectioncontent.livetable.section=Section name # Other keys sectioncontent.entry.name=Section sectioncontent.entry.create.hint=Section page sectioncontent.entries.title=Sections # Deprecated keys sectioncontent.dataSpace.title=Data # Keys used when creating a new section sectioncontent.sectionAvailable=This section is available sectioncontent.sectionUnavailable=This section is not available # Translation panel sectioncontent.translationPanel.title=Translations sectioncontent.translationPanel.bulkCreateTranslations=Bulk-translate sectioncontent.translationPanel.modal.title=Bulk-translate sectioncontent.translationPanel.modal.create=Translate sectioncontent.translationPanel.modal.close=Close sectioncontent.translationPanel.modal.selectTranslation=Select translation to create or update sectioncontent.translationPanel.modal.existingTranslation=Existing translation: {1} sectioncontent.translationPanel.modal.noTranslation=No existing translation sectioncontent.translation.history.translate=Automated translation from {0} sectioncontent.translation.history.attachmentReset=Reset attachments
